Description:
Poolside Pleasure, Parkland Precinct
Elevated on the high side of the street, this three-bedroom, one-bathroom home enjoys glimpses to the east towards the Yarra Valley. There's plenty of space to unwind & relax next to the toasty rustic brick fireplace in the living room. Designed to keep the chef in the conversation, the dining area is open-planned to the smart black and white kitchen which is equipped with excellent work space & a stainless-steel dishwasher, oven & cooktop. A brick-paved patio, huge back garden & an in-ground pool entice for outdoor relaxation & summer entertaining. Featuring a single carport, laundry, gleaming floorboards, timber ceilings & garden sheds, the home also offers significant scope to upsize the accommodation with a rear extension if desired (STCA). With walking paths & parkland tranquillity in every direction, excellent schools & Croydon North Plaza nearby & Croydon Station a dash away, this soul-soothing offering will change the way you live your life forever.
Land Size: 877sqm approximately.

Description:
A Lifestyle to Envy at an Unbeatable Price
Quietly nestled in a spectacular court setting and suitably elevated to soak up the picturesque views, this stunning home is perfectly located for the busy family. Framed by exquisite, low-maintenance gardens, as soon as you enter through the front door you'll be drawn in by the sophisticated air with a warm and inviting ambience. Relish the abundance of living space from the resplendent formal lounge, to the separate dining featuring a classic bay window flowing through to the open plan family/meals area, there is no shortage of space to recline or entertain. The home showcases an impressive kitchen with an abundance of cupboard/bench space, walk-in pantry, dishwasher, and is centrally located to both dining areas and the covered outdoor area, making entertaining a breeze.
All three bedrooms are generously sized. Bedrooms one and two have built-in robes and are serviced by a light-filled bathroom. The master suite is the place to retreat, reflect and rejuvenate featuring a walk-in robe and sizable en-suite with double shower.
The winning combination of ducted heating and evaporative cooling will ensure seasonal comfort while other inclusions to capture your attention are; electric oven, gas hot plates, laundry with cupboard space, remote double garage with internal access, high ceilings, storage cupboards, two water tanks and ample off-street parking.
Presenting a lovely street appeal, your life will be enriched by this lifestyle location being close to great schools, shops, and transport. If you'd like to experience the red carpet treatment every day, this elegant lady should be yours.
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
CHARACTER WEATHERBOARD & ALL YEAR ENTERTAINER!
Well back from the road and occupying a private 1/4 acre allotment, this charming family house has been updated and improved for the last 38 years, and now you benefit! The idyllic fusion of character features and contemporary luxuries create a genuinely welcoming home suited to families and entertainers!
Three bedrooms with built-in robes share a chic, recently-renovated bathroom with a frameless walk-in shower. A 2nd toilet adjoins the large laundry, suggesting potential for another bathroom. Overlooking the front deck and landscaped gardens, the lounge room features built-in cabinetry, an open fireplace and an inverter split system. Illuminated by a skylight, the central kitchen has a gas stove and dishwasher, adjoining the dining area framed by a fernery. The sunken, timber-feature family room is anchored by a Coonara gas heater and enjoys backyard views.
The private backyard with paved BBQ area, entertaining deck and a gas-heated Swim Spa will appeal to all ages!
Original features include stunning leadlight and sash windows, decorative cornices and reclaimed doors. Freshly painted throughout, the home also features a double carport, garden shed/workshop, ceiling fans and garden vistas from almost every window!
Surrounded by wonderful parks, walking tracks and quality schools, this brilliant family home is also metres from Griff Hunt Reserve, with a bus at the doorstep! Close to Exeter Rd shopping and cafes and a short drive from Chirnside Park shopping centre, Croydon Town Centre, Eastland and EastLink.
Warren Paas

Description:
Looking For That X-Factor?
Set in a desirably tranquil cul-de-sac within sought-after Croydon North, this well-presented residence is not only superbly adorned with meticulous landscaping, but also features luxurious inclusions to keep your family pampered. Entry into the main foyer will immediately give an impression of what to expect throughout the home; a continuity of wall-to-wall spaciousness. Thoughtfully designed to maximise entertaining options, there's a choice of living zones: the main L-shaped lounge area, generously proportioned with a perfect balance of crisp white and vibrant coloured walls, this comfy zone is perfect for relaxation or formal dining. Only steps away, the timber kitchen will excite your creative flow, comprising; dishwasher, electric wall oven, gas cook top, breakfast bar and overlooks the huge family area - the hub of everyday living. Designed for privacy, the enchanting master bedroom is peacefully situated away from the kids' bedrooms and incorporates a walk-in robe, full en-suite with double-sized shower, ceiling fan and romantic bay window creating a tasteful and restful retreat.
The additional three bedrooms are situated in a wing at the other end of the home with; three robed bedrooms, two double sized and one with elevated views - all serviced by a light-filled and updated bathroom.
What you will appreciate most though is the covered entertaining area where celebrating birthdays and treasured family moments is made easy by the abundant space; but the corner of conversation would have to be the sparkling spa - ah, this is the life!
Never again will you have to live without; gas ducted heating, air-conditioning (x2), watering system (front and back), remote double garage with trailer parking at rear, paved pathways, sandpit, cubby house and an endless list of quality appointments and smart floor plan that further enhances all that is unique and desirable about living in Croydon North.
Positioned in a tightly held, family-friendly court close to shops, reserves, public transport, respected secondary schools and only a few hundred metres from Yarra Road Primary school, this is truly a home for those accustomed to first-class living.
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Families will love this spacious brick veneer home situated in an elevated position close to countless schools and family amenities. Architecturally designed to maximise the impressive outlook, this home comprises open-plan kitchen/meals with stainless steel appliances and great bench space, separate lounge, rumpus/pool room with bar, 3 robed bedrooms (main with ensuite and Juliet balcony), modern family bathroom, powder room, downstairs study, and laundry with external access. Outside boasts a number of secluded courtyards for a quiet cuppa or BBQ, attractive terraced rear garden, and level lawn. Additional features include ducted heating, split system air conditioning, cosy wood fire, security alarm, intercom, wine cellar, watering system, water tanks, and integrated double garage plus additional off-street parking. With Luther College, Steiner School, Yarra Valley Grammar, the Village school and numerous local schools nearby, plus easy access to local parklands, shops, bus and the beautiful Yarra Valley. Inspection will not disappoint!

Description:
MAKE A FRESH START
Attractive with sun awnings on large windows and a fresh white painted facade this well presented 3 bedrooms home is the ideal first or investment home. A short walk from bus and shops in leafy street it presents hardwood timber floors through comfortable living and dining room, a large relaxing family room beyond a classic central kitchen with skylight and it boasts a fantastic brand new ultra smart bathroom. Ducted heating, ceiling fans, an air conditioner, timber and vertical blinds this is just the one you've been looking for...and wait, there's also a steel double garage set at rear through sides gates.
- Fantastic 3 bedrooms first home in leafy street close to Croydon North shops and bus
- Level 861m2 with rear double garage
- Hardwood floorboards in living and dining, classic central kitchen with skylight and family room
- Ducted heating, air conditioner plus stunning brand new modern bathroom

Address: 8 James Milne Drive Croydon North VIC 3136
Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
You'll look forward to coming home every day to this beautiful family-sized home spread over two generous levels. With a lovely leafy outlook and fabulous indoor/outdoor flow, accommodation comprises inviting lounge/dining, 3 robed bedrooms (main with walk-in robe and ensuite), study/possible 4th bedroom, good-sized family bathroom, fabulous laundry plus powder room, and open-plan kitchen/meals zone featuring tiled floor, Bosch stainless steel dishwasher, gas cooking and wall oven. Step outside to the covered alfresco area for a morning coffee, or head further into the immaculate rear garden to enjoy a second alfresco terrace, level lawn and pretty landscaping. Additional features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, neutral carpet and décor, garden shed, remote double garage, plus secure off-street parking for caravan/boat/trailer etc. With easy access to Luther College, Croydon Hills Primary School, McAdam Square shops, bus, train, and more - this comfortable family haven will not disappoint.

Description:
Top-quality living & entertaining
With the plethora of townhouses on the market, it takes a very special property to maintain your attention and enthusiasm. Just 3 years old and fully-appointed, this freestanding 3 bedroom townhouse with a 5-star energy rating is a standout home, positioned opposite Hughes Park and at the end of a cul-de-sac.
Immaculately presented and stylishly decorated, you'll be impressed by the open plan ground floor that flows out to a private deck with a northerly aspect. This flexible living and dining area features gleaming timber floors, a split system and designer lighting, with dual roller blinds framing large sliding doors that fuse indoors and out. Designed for effortless entertaining, the alfresco deck has built-in lighting and is surrounded by drought-tolerant landscaped gardens with electric up-lighting that is spectacular at night! A well-appointed galley-style kitchen boasts Caesar Stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances including a 900mm cooker and a dishwasher, adjoining a generous laundry. Upstairs, 3 carpeted bedrooms with built-in robes surround a TV/family room with a reverse cycle air-conditioner and a built-in study desk. Adjacent to a separate toilet, the main bathroom features a separate bath and shower, complemented by a stone-topped vanity, while the luxury master bedroom features a split system, walk-in robe and an equally-stunning ensuite with heated towel rails.
The remote double garage offers secure internal access and further appointments include: ducted heating, reverse cycle split systems, alarm, powder room, under-stairs storage and a water tank, with high-quality blinds and designer lighting throughout.
Amongst a boutique development that is predominantly owner-occupied, enjoy a communal lawn area or pop across the road to a reserve and creek. Walk to Exeter Rd shops and cafes, with nearby buses, schools and reserves. Just a short drive from Chirnside Park shopping centre, Eastland and EastLink are reached within 10 minutes.
- Designer blinds and lighting
- Caesar Stone bench and vanity tops
- Ducted heating
- Reverse cycle split systems
- Entertainer's deck with lighting
- Stainless steel appliances
- 2 living areas
Terms 10% deposit, balance 60/90 days
Land: Subdivision

Description:
Fine Family Living! Court Location!
Set within a family-friendly court location and abutting a tranquil reserve, this highly-functional home will respond to the needs of a growing family. Upon entering, your immediate attention is drawn to the overwhelming feeling of spaciousness and appointments on offer. Featuring a perfect balance between formal and casual living, the front lounge/dining soaks up the luscious gardens with the French doors opening out to a private and paved courtyard - a restful area in which to unwind.
The heart of entertaining all starts in the fabulous kitchen comprising a large pantry, stainless steel dishwasher, gas cook top, electric oven and adjacent tiled meals area. The rich timber floor (floating) provides character to the large fireside family room, which cascades out to yet another entertaining deck with built-in BBQ and sink - overlooking the adventure-filled backyard where the kids will love playing in the cubby house and discovering the secret garden. The floorplan has been well executed with the study (optional 5th bedroom) and powder room downstairs for added convenience.
The upper level houses a family bathroom with mountain vistas, four sizable robed bedrooms, the master suite with walk-in robe, full en-suite with double vanity and delightful parents' retreat. The study nook is the perfect place for a desk or couch where the sunlight streams in as you're entrenched in a good book.
Other desirable inclusions are; ducted heating and vacuum, double garage with remote entry, ceiling fans, intercom and plenty of storage throughout, including underneath the stairs.
Situated close to Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar School, transport and there's even a children's playground at the bowl of the court. This substantial home truly captures the essence of fine family living.
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282

Description:
The Hallmark of Quality Family Living!
Showcasing two levels of crisp, contemporary, sun-filled interiors, this substantial home amassing 40 squares (approx) is privately nestled in a sought-after pocket of Croydon North. As you arrive, you'll be mesmerised by the enchanting rose garden and one of the most perfect examples of modern Federation-style facades you'll find today. With an unsurpassed floorplan incorporating multiple living zones that work well whether the residents are a couple or a family, the wall-to-wall spaciousness gives an airy feel from the formal lounge and dining, to the meals area, family room and rumpus rooms. The modern kitchen integrates functionality and style with; granite bench tops, stainless steel appliances, island bench with breakfast bar and a stunning, glossy white finish. With individuality that sets this home apart from others, you'll be surprised to find two master bedrooms; one with walk-in robe and en-suite featuring a double vanity and the second, retreat-sized bedroom comprises three double built-in robes and en-suite effect bathroom.
The lower level could be utilised for multiple purposes with a large rumpus room, wine cellar, powder room and third bedroom with built-in robes providing the perfect teenage retreat, guest accommodation, home office, studio ... the list is endless.
Here is your chance to secure a property with a study, intercom, storage, ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling and double garage (remote) with internal entry and pedestrian access to rear.
Only 8 years young, this low-maintenance residence is close to Croydon Hills Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary, McAdam Square shops, bus routes, reserves and EastLink. Don't be fooled by its gorgeous exterior, this home is abundantly spacious, fully-loaded and means business.
Pauline Ferguson : 0402 335 842

Description:
STANDALONE UNIT EXUDES IMPECCABLE CLASS
An elegant street presence and impeccable quality showcase this street front standalone 3 bedrooms unit along with its handy gated van/boat carport, rear auto double garage with internal access and lovely gardens. Near roads end opposite parkland it is a rare and exciting find. Plush carpet and custom furnishings dress the sunny living and separate formal dining rooms while floor tiles highlight the large meals/family zone by smart stainless steel appointed hostess kitchen. With classy ensuite and bathroom, ducted heating and split system plus a superb courtyard, this home is quality all the way.
- Premier street front standalone 3 bedroom unit boasts gated side carport and double garage
- Impeccably appointed living and formal dining, tiled family/meals, classy ensuite plus superb hostess kitchen
- Mirrored robes, plush carpet, elegant quality furnishings, ducted heating and a split system
- Manicured private rear courtyard with alfresco deck
- Enviably near roads end opposite lush parklands and convenient to North Croydon shops

Description:
Stylish, Spacious & Serene
If you've been dreaming of a lifestyle where you're surrounded by magnificent open parklands and native wildlife, then you're going to adore this modern and spacious townhouse that is close to it all and has it all. As soon as you enter the sunlit atrium foyer, the lush, green gardens are drawn inside through the vast glazing's making it difficult to click out of holiday mode in this restful home. The open plan living area oozes a sense of style and grace featuring a highly functional kitchen comprising stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, generous bench and cupboard space. The dining cascades outside where you'll spend your weekends relaxing in the paved courtyard enhanced by a trickling water feature, lovely green lawns, exquisite landscaping and for your utmost privacy, the home backs on to an uninhabited zone. The powder room downstairs is an added luxury whilst upstairs, the well-executed floorplan showcases three robed bedrooms and a stylish, family-sized bathroom which leads through to the master to create an en-suite effect. Furthermore, the home incorporates features such as; gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, internal access from the double lock-up garage and additional guest parking. This fabulous residence will appeal to first-home buyers, investors and retiree/empty nesters who require a low maintenance property without compromising on space for entertaining.
Situated close to schools, shops, public transport, parks and reserves, daydreaming comes naturally in this place you could call home.
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Beautiful Lifestyle or Investment 1 Yr Young
At only 1 year young, this stunning single-level brick veneer townhouse delivers an effortless lifestyle or investment for Professionals, Retirees or Investors. It's set in a premier no-through road close to transport, shops and EastLink and is ready to enjoy. Privately positioned well back from the road - in an exclusive block - the sun-kissed interior makes a high quality statement with its high ceilings, contemporary window furnishings, fresh neutral palette and ultra-modern carpets. Discover two separate living areas for easy living and entertaining. Relax in style in the chic lounge room, or delight in the sparkling open plan gourmet kitchen showcasing s/s Euro appliances, including dishwasher. Fusing indoor/outdoor living, the tiled family/meals area has doors leading to the attractive landscaped courtyard where the focus is on privacy and easy-care. Two double bedrooms (BIRs) are complemented by a deluxe ensuite-effect bathroom and laundry. The finishing touches include: gas ducted heating and single lock-up garage with remote. With parkland and walking trail at the end of the street, and a short walk to Village Primary, bus and shops. Close to Oxley College and Chirnside shopping. You won't want to miss it!

Set at the rear of a sensational development with a reserve as your neighbor, this home could be your private escape. Description:
The Perfect Family Living In Private School Precinct
Spacious living areas, a sensational outdoor entertaining set-up and zoned accommodation are hallmarks of this quality family home, serenely set back from Yarra Rd and located within walking distance of local schools.
A beautifully presented, single-level interior epitomises modern living with its fabulous mix of formal and casual living areas, loads of natural light, polished timber floorboards, gas ducted heating and split system heating and cooling.
Those that love to host will enjoy entertaining in the L-shaped formal lounge and dining setting with built-in bar or outside on the elevated alfresco that's bordered with established trees, capped with stunning in-ground Jacuzzi and direct access to a large lagoon-style swimming pool!
Back inside, a light and bright open-plan setting has it all, from a standout kitchen with plenty of bench space, abundant storage options and stainless steel appliances to a grand open fireplace that provides a warm touch to the inviting family living.
Zoned living also successfully separates the home's generous-sized bedrooms from the vibrant living areas - perfect for those who appreciate their privacy!
Bordering Croydon Hills this premium family-friendly location is conveniently within walking distance of The Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary School, Yarra Road Primary, Croydon Hills Primary, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar, while Croydon train station, scenic parks and shops are only a short distance away.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
TOWNHOUSE STYLE HOME TO SUIT DOWNSIZERS
Sitting pretty in the tucked away enclave, yet convenient to shops and transport is the picture perfect appeal and impeccable presentation of the charming 3 bedrooms home and manicured garden. Just the ticket for downsizers, retirees or even first home buyers it boasts a double garage and low maintenance. It is also a home of modern quality and soft neutral style, open flow living with well designed central hostess kitchen and dining/family plus generous entertaining with a rear deck and alfresco patio. Ducted comfort, ceiling fans, stylish ensuite effect bathroom, you’ll know this is the one!

Description:
Peace, Home & Harmony
Set in the exclusive and tightly-held Bronte Court with views across to Hochkins Ridge Flora Reserve, this beautiful home offers a lifestyle that caters perfectly to the multi-generational family with its thoughtfully designed floor plan.
From the outset, the home presents beautifully, seamlessly divided into a primary and secondary residence. Manicured gardens, grand facade and a pristine interior with fine finishes including parquetry, fresh wool carpets, tiles, lined curtains and sheer lace. The living areas – the lounge/dining room, family zone – revolve around the central kitchen with quality appliances and an abundance of cupboard space. The 3 bedrooms are zoned privately upstairs (study downstairs), all with built-in robes, the large main bedroom with en suite, spa, walk-in-robe and additional air-conditioner. Extra incentives include a powder room for guests, fantastic timber deck with tranquil garden views (storage area beneath), ducted heating, evaporative cooling and double garage.
The secondary residence provides a generous living area, 2 bedrooms, bathroom with double shower and safety railing, sunny modern kitchen that looks out over the large backyard with exquisite gardens and covered outdoor entertaining. There is also a timber deck exclusive to this part of the home. It is the ideal scenario, ensuring both a sense of independence and family inclusion with separate entrance and garage with internal access.
The peaceful ambience of the location is exceptional. It is rare to find a home for sale in this tranquil cul-de-sac, and is, therefore, a particularly warm and friendly place to live with a Christmas street party held each year. Being Croydon North, there are a number of quality schools at your disposal: Luther College, Oxley College, Yarra Road Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar and Croydon North Primary. Similarly, there are several shopping precincts within close proximity: Chirnside Park, Eastland, Macadam Square and Croydon Centro to name a few. Within minutes are the rolling hills of the Yarra Valley and a huge array of boutique and mainstream wineries.
Peaceful location. Wonderful home. Harmonious family living.
Insights: 7 Bronte Court, Croydon North VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020 and 16 other 5 bedroom house in Croydon North have recently been sold.

Description:
Fine Family Living
In a sought after location, prized for quiet, leafy surrounds, this lovingly updated home presents the ideal floor plan for peaceful family living. With large formal and informal living spaces and 4 generous bedrooms, it is presented in flawless modern style accentuated by abundant natural light.
This property offers:
- 700SQM (approx) of radiant spaces, inside & out
- Spacious, contemporary & bright living spaces
- 3 living areas allow entertaining & comfort
- Impressive kitchen provides new s-s apps & garden views
- Spectacular covered decking; a great entertaining space
- 4xBIR, Colorbond shed, Split system A/C, Dbl R/C garage
- A location near prestigious schools, reserves, transport & shops
With features like these, it won’t be on the market for long. Call today!

Address: 47 Oak Tree Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
YOUR VERY OWN HIDE-AWAY
Nestled at the end of a lovely tree-lined, no-through road, hidden behind a tall fence and wrought iron gates. Sit on a huge 1313m2 (approx) allotment, this is a home for those who love their privacy. The home itself is a classic colonial style home with formal lounge/dining, fully equipped Tasmanian Oak kitchen, three bedrooms plus a study (master with ensuite), double garage, gas ducted heating, and lovely established gardens. The lounge has a huge open fire and French doors open out from both the lounge and family room. Try and resist the resort style 7 meter spa and lap pool which is fully automated and gas heated. Call now for a private inspection.
Tony Smith : 0411 424 964
